comment._content: Looking south- west from Milson Island - maps.google.com.au/maps?ll=-33.521832,151.17221&spn=0... See similar view [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/7411628166/]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks beachcomber, that looks about right! We reckon we could now plot on a map the passage Hall took through the Hawkesbury. :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Some of the other 'Hawkesbury' photos have me puzzled - I think many are tributaries (Macdonald, Colo, Nepean, etc).  Hmmm ...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Were you referring to this one? The President of the Dharug and Lower Hawkesbury Historical Society thinks that this one may have been taken at Colo River.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Yes,  I thought Nepean Gorge for that photo,  but I don't know either (Nepean or Colo)  river at all well.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] It is a tricky one. It would be great if we could do a then and now shot!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] That is part of the problem - according to the Nepean River Wikipedia entry, the river and gorge is now a series of lakes due to the creation of weirs and dams since this photo. If it is the Nepean Gorge before the weirs, then the huge catchment area would be liable to funnel enormous stormwater floods through this narrow (and long) section, moving those boulders like pebbles, and scouring out the vegetation. Hmmm .... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepean_River

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hmmm, just read this and it is a good point, possible explanation as to why the photograph you posted looks very different.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
